ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie project stats
ygData.msgSnippet: Live frogs in upper guk cant see you if you use bard invis. To get to the room where the asassain spawns in lower guk, you traverse upper guk (all live) then
ygData.messageBody:
Live frogs in upper guk cant see you if you use bard invis.

To get to the room where the asassain spawns in lower guk, you traverse
upper guk (all live) then enter the "dead side" of lower guk. But near the
zone to the dead side are some live frogs too. When the server is busy,
they are usually killed by folks waiting for groups. People usually get
invis-to-undead here. Then there are undead frogs between the zone and the
bedroom. You go past the bedroom and past some live vampire bats (hope that
they are camped) and undead frogs. Then past the greater ice bone skellies
- who will agro if you get near them regardless of your invis or
invis-to-undead. From there - go across the bridge to the tower and in and
to the left to the 2nd ladder you see and up the ladder to the
supplier/assasain room.

Yes, its *possible* but most folks who do it have run the route before in
their other characters.

If you go and beg this item now, what will you camp for when you are 35-45
and spending a lot of time in Lower Guk getting exp?

Sylly Songsynger
(The Pantheon)
Minstrel somewhere on Innoruuk...


-----Original Message-----
From: Scott Malin [mailto:Thanos0000@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 8:48 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Newbie project stats


How about this in the leaching catagory. The mask of deception, my
understanding is that this rots a lot on most servers. I also see a lot of
lower level bards with one. When I have 19th level invis song is it possible
to get to the Assissin room (provided it's camped) and wait patiently and
politly for one to drop?
